game.s_dis: CATS: Crash Arena Turbo Stars is a battle-builder game where you design and upgrade combat machines to fight in chaotic 1v1 showdowns.
game.l_dis:
Play CATS: Crash Arena Turbo Stars – Build and Battle

CATS: Crash Arena Turbo Stars – Unblocked is a creative and action-packed arena game from the makers of Cut the Rope. Take on the role of a crafty feline engineer and build your own powerful battle machine from a mix of weapons, gadgets, and body parts. Then, send it into the arena to destroy opponents in high-energy 1v1 combat!

What is CATS: Crash Arena Turbo Stars?

CATS is a mix of engineering and mayhem. Players craft their unique combat vehicle and battle automatically against others in thrilling matches. Strategy and creativity are key — only the best designs survive!

How to Play CATS

  • Build Your Machine: Combine different parts, weapons, and wheels to create your perfect battle vehicle.
  • Upgrade Gear: Earn crates and rewards to unlock stronger weapons and components.
  • Fight Automatically: Your machine battles opponents without direct control — design wisely!
  • Join Gangs: Team up with friends and compete in gang battles for extra rewards.

Why Play CATS: Crash Arena Turbo Stars?

CATS blends creativity, combat, and competition. Each match challenges your engineering skills — build smarter, fight harder, and climb the global ranks to become the ultimate arena champion.

Key Features

  • Customizable Battle Machines: Countless combinations of bodies, weapons, and gadgets.
  • Automated Battles: Design strategy-driven vehicles and watch them fight.
  • Competitive Leagues: Climb ranks and earn prestige in global competitions.
  • Gangs & Tournaments: Collaborate with others to dominate special events.
  • Free & Browser-Friendly: Play instantly online without downloads.

Build. Battle. Dominate.

Design, upgrade, and unleash your ultimate feline-powered battle machine in CATS: Crash Arena Turbo Stars. Outsmart your rivals and prove you’re the top cat in the arena!
